title: Bug 117981 - Unable to select any item in the library outline view on the first attempt.
description: Description: Any item cannot be selected when initially opening the library outline view. Steps to reproduce: 1.
OB: When attempting to select any item in the library outline view for the first time, the focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view instead of allowing the item to be selected.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Add a label in the library file. 2. Select the label item in the library outline view. 3.
